channel.title: I know how it is, I hate to be a Pain but I seriously Need Help, Please
channel.description:
So, the story begins. One day my friend told me to see his "youtube" movie, I watched it, got interested, made a "youtube" account (also nt55 as is my "runescape" account) and then I look at some of these runescape videos. About half of the ones I watch have MoparScape in them and I decide "this is exactly what I was looking for!". So I visit this site, I follow your downloading instructions souly for the purpose of gaming, not programming, although I'd love to learn how. And then I get some problems, some I fix, some I dont. This is where you guys come in.
On youtube I saw people walk through walls, cast magic spells without runes, trade with people for outstanding items, and type things like ":pickup 1030" to make a red party hat poof into thier inventory, I got onto my hybrid server.....and I can't do any of it! its just like a normal runescape world, which is not what I wanted......please help with this.
Also, I have to make a "Hybrid Server" to play, and I'm all by myself.......I want to play with other people so I go into the server status list and I copy the information from there into the game as I interpet it, now either I'm reading the info wrong or something, I really dont know.
With reading this and being the kind people that you are, expecting to be flooded by players in distress, please help.

item.title: I know how it is, I hate to be a Pain but I seriously Need Help, Please
item.dc:creator: @blacker blacker
item.description:
@blacker wrote:

[quote=“Nt55, post:1, topic:16139”]So, the story begins. One day my friend told me to see his “youtube” movie, I watched it, got interested, made a “youtube” account (also nt55 as is my “runescape” account) and then I look at some of these runescape videos. About half of the ones I watch have MoparScape in them and I decide “this is exactly what I was looking for!”. So I visit this site, I follow your downloading instructions souly for the purpose of gaming, not programming, although I’d love to learn how. And then I get some problems, some I fix, some I dont. This is where you guys come in.

On youtube I saw people walk through walls, cast magic spells without runes, trade with people for outstanding items, and type things like “:pickup 1030” to make a red party hat poof into thier inventory, I got onto my hybrid server…and I can’t do any of it! its just like a normal runescape world, which is not what I wanted…please help with this.

Also, I have to make a “Hybrid Server” to play, and I’m all by myself…I want to play with other people so I go into the server status list and I copy the information from there into the game as I interpet it, now either I’m reading the info wrong or something, I really dont know.

With reading this and being the kind people that you are, expecting to be flooded by players in distress, please help.[/quote] Go into the server advertisement page. Ifyou wanna make a server go to the server downloads page and download a source. Then start adding codes from tuts, all the while studying java.

Read full topic

@typenamehere wrote:

ok first thing people dit there severs so u can without runes n stuff second its ::pcikup (item code) (number you want) eg. ::pickup 0995 999 thats 999 coins and the server problem if your going from server status page they need to refresh before you can see which are online and which are not you should go to advertisment and check there most of them are but require you to download hamachi (google it) hope this helps :D.
